util/

hiihat_rainbow_index.pro


top source hiihat_rainbow_index

util

result = hiihat_rainbow_index(index [, /BLACK] [, /WHITE])

Takes an index between 0 and 1 and maps it to a rainbow spectra that returns an appropriate 24 bit integer representation in RGB space. Ensure you have loadct,0 active (grey scale) for sanity.

Return value

24 bit integer representation in RGB space.

Parameters

index

value in [0,1] to map to RGB

Keywords

BLACK in optional type=boolean

Add black to the below_red region of the matrix

WHITE in optional type=boolean

Add white to the above_purple region of the matrix

Author information

Author:

David Ray Thompson
